description: MDGs Reporting and Introduction into Libyan Monitoring and Planning

subproject.corporate outcome: strengthened capacities of the national institutions for data collection and planning and monitoring
subproject.description:
1.	Production of the “The Millennium Development Report (MDG Report) for the Libyan Arab Jamahiriya”.
2.	Prepare the establishment of DEV-INFO online data base.
3.	MDGs advocacy and transparency increased through communication and dialogue.
4.	Action plan for establishment and use of DEV-INFO and MDGs as a tool in national planning and monitoring process.
5.	Development of work plan to produce the National Human Development Report for the Libyan Arab Jamahiriya. 
6.	Support the report’s methodology meet the International Standards.
7.	Develop the statistical capacities of the GIA’s staff.
8.	Exchange International experiences and seeking good practices.
subproject.title: MDG Reporting and Intro. in Li

title: MDG Reporting and Intro. in Libyan Monitoring & Planning
